website_summaries.verdict: Great ladder for the price, but pass over this one if you weigh over 200 pounds or want to use this with a lot of tools.
pros: Quite light and easy to use
feels stable, too, and the price is right
cons: Only holds up to 200 pounds and is only 16 feet in length

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable strong for its value
customer_reviews.text: I used to borrowed extension ladder from neighbor when I wanted to climb up to the roof and clean up the gutter. It's very inconvenient but I could not carry a ladder home with my sedan. Eventually I found out this and brought it home through Amazon. It is reasonable strong for my weight (160 lb), but might be somewhat not sturdy enough for a 200 lb guy as it claimed. I had been use it for few years, and felt it's a good time to write a review for its durability. Nice to have one for any home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent extension ladder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent extension ladder. Light and very easy to move from place to place. Stays in place. If you are under 200 pounds, including any tools or buckets you bring up with you,this is a great ladder at a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ladder!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ladder!! I was looking for a light weight easy to maneuver around the house ladder. This one definitely fit the bill!! Even the Fed-EX delivery lady said she wished more customers order these light weight ladders. HA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sungirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband... He really likes it. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Real nice Ladder
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is light weight yet sturdy. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and bargain price with delivery to our house.
customer_reviews.author: skimcpa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ladder
customer_reviews.text: great ladder for the price. quality built for a light-weight and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky D

customer_reviews.title: which makes it easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: The ladder arrived with dents in the frame, despite the fact there was cardboard packaging over it. The aluminum is very light, which makes it easy to carry, but it does seem somewhat flimsy. Okay for occasional homeowner's use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: It's so light weight! Much easier to use around ...
customer_reviews.text: It's so light weight! Much easier to use around the yard than other, heavier, foldout ladders.
customer_reviews.author: Gary N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy ladder and great price
customer_reviews.text: Some of you may be thinking, why should I buy a ladder from Amazon? There are plenty of local stores in the surrounding area...but none offer delivery. This ladder is around 14 foot long non-extended (28foot extended), so to have it delivered right to my house was great! I used the ladder right away and was able to reach every part of my home. It is rated for 200 lbs, I am 175 and I did not feel any give at all in the ladder. Nicely constructed and made of aluminum, not too bad to move around. If you're shopping for a ladder and do not have a flatbed trailer handy...give Amazon the chance to deliver to you.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice ladder
customer_reviews.text: Nice ladder for the price and it came right to the house no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: professonal
customer_reviews.text: Everything was excellent, professional, good timing and all that they said they would do.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Beccaria

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: As usual great dealing with Amazon Good news is I love the ladder Bad news is all my neighbors want to borrow it LOL
customer_reviews.author: Robert from Parkland Fl

customer_reviews.title: Good Ladder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ladder to change outside floodlights which are at about a second story level. The ladder did not quite reach that far, so I purchased a 24 foot ladder. However, I have used this ladder to change the outside light in front of my house which is at a one story level. The ladder worked well for that purpose. The ladder is easy to operate and not to heavy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good Ladder for good price
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our ladder. It is exactly what we wanted. I think we had to pay $20 for shipping, but there was no other way for us to get a ladder of this size to our house.
customer_reviews.author: Classic Debut

customer_reviews.title: Perfect household ladder
customer_reviews.text: We used it to change a cathedral ceiling lightbulb first. Then we used it to decorate our house and very tall trees for Christmas. It is a heavy-duty ladder that will last a lifetime. It feels secure when you are on it and collapses for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Too lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I suppose it's my fault for ordering the cheapest one, but after having used it, I would have ordered the next weight/strength level up. I weigh about 180, and it sometimes it feels as if it's about to buckle. Works fine in all regards, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Ladder
customer_reviews.text: This is a specialty ladder. Should not be sold as an extension ladder for home use. Far to "TOP_HEAVY" for streight-Up applications". Could not use without help (2 Men) in It's full exsteded mode. Maby the smallest version but not the 26' model.
customer_reviews.author: Ray E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ladder to do some work on the side of my house and it was very sturdy....regardless of me having fear of heights...Great sturdy ladder.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: You would do better to spend the money to get a sturdier ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Winter Solar Panal maintenance ladder!
customer_reviews.text: This 20ft Ladder is not only light-weight, maneuverable but also: In Winter's snow Werner's improved raised Tread Ridges (on top of the rungs) give a sense of increased security. Scraping the snow off my boots on the first rung is essential from there on up when operating in the snow! The Werner ladder has a better feel for secure footing, but my more $ and weight, 24' fiberglass ladder is wider/ more stable. If I had to make a choice between the 2, - Werner - Easy to set-up. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: No Extra Charge ;-)

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Werner ladders
customer_reviews.text: My husband died because extension ladder came down and slammed him on to the floor . My husband was only 62 years old and healthy. But he died because of a Werner ladder . Think twice before you buy or uses a Werner ladder . It could be you next .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: [...] Extension ladders are rated on the size of the two ladder sections total height. But you can never use them at that total height, since they won't lock together. So this 16' ladder can only be extended to a maximum of 13'. And you are not supposed to stand on the top rung of the ladder, unless you like to live dangerously. In reality I would probably give this ladder a 3 or 4 star review because I don't think you should buy a 200lb capacity ladder. To me 250lb is the minimum with 300lb preferred.
customer_reviews.author: John Villalovos

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Ladder is technically 13 feet long. It is extremely lightweight but strong. Although it is rated 200 lbs, like all ladders I recommend a max weight of 80%, meaning good for someone weighing 160lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Marcellus

product_meta.title: Werner D1116-2 Extension-ladders, 16-Foot
product_meta.description:
Size:16 feet1-1/2 In. flat top rung for sure footed comfort. 2-3/4 In. modified I beam side rail on 16 Ft. thru 24 Ft. 3 In. I beam side rail on 28 Ft. thru 40 Ft. Only 6 In. from ground to first rung. Exclusive ALFLO hardened rung joint makes rungs spin-proof for lifetime strength and safety. UL listed and labeled. 16 Ft. thru 32 Ft. : 3 Ft. overlap, 40 Ft. : 4 Ft. overlap. Rope and pulley on 20 Ft. and larger. Type III household duty rating 200 Lb. load capacity.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This light duty aluminum extension ladder has a 200 pound duty rating (Type III). The rungs are aluminum slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs. Rungs are connected to the rails with Werner exclusive Alflo rung joint connection for twist-proof performance. Internal guides at the bottom of the fly section securely interlock rails. Gravity spring locks operate smoothly. Pivoting shoe with slip-resistant pad. This model is not equipped with rope and pulley.
feature_bullets: Flat Top Rung For Sure Footed Comfort
